par.name: fates_history_ageclass_bin_edges
par.long: Lower edges for age class bins used in age-resolved patch history output

par.name: fates_history_coageclass_bin_edges
par.long: Lower edges for cohort age class bins used in cohort age resolved history output

par.name: fates_history_height_bin_edges
par.long: Lower edges for height bins used in height-resolved history output

par.name: fates_history_damage_bin_edges
par.long: Lower edges for damage class bins used in cohort history output

par.name: fates_history_sizeclass_bin_edges
par.long: Lower edges for DBH size class bins used in size-resolved cohort history output

par.name: fates_alloc_organ_id
par.long: This is the global index that the organ in this file is associated with, values match those in parteh/PRTGenericMod.F90

par.name: fates_hydro_htftype_node
par.long: Switch that defines the hydraulic transfer functions for each organ.

par.name: fates_pftname
par.long: Description of plant type

par.name: fates_hydro_organ_name
par.long: Name of plant hydraulics organs (DONT CHANGE, order matches media list in FatesHydraulicsMemMod.F90)

par.name: fates_alloc_organ_name
par.long: Name of plant organs (with alloc_organ_id, must match PRTGenericMod.F90)

par.name: fates_landuseclass_name
par.long: Name of the land use classes, for variables associated with dimension fates_landuseclass

par.name: fates_litterclass_name
par.long: Name of the litter classes, for variables associated with dimension fates_litterclass

par.name: fates_alloc_organ_priority
par.long: Priority level for allocation, 1 replaces turnover from storage, 2 same priority as storage use/replacement, 3 ascending in order of least importance

par.name: fates_alloc_storage_cushion
par.long: maximum size of storage C pool, relative to maximum size of leaf C pool

par.name: fates_alloc_store_priority_frac
par.long: for high-priority organs, the fraction of their turnover demand that is gauranteed to be replaced, and if need-be by storage

par.name: fates_allom_agb1
par.long: Parameter 1 for agb allometry

par.name: fates_allom_agb2
par.long: Parameter 2 for agb allometry

par.name: fates_allom_agb3
par.long: Parameter 3 for agb allometry

par.name: fates_allom_agb4
par.long: Parameter 4 for agb allometry

par.name: fates_allom_agb_frac
par.long: Fraction of woody biomass that is above ground

par.name: fates_allom_amode
par.long: AGB allometry function index.

par.name: fates_allom_blca_expnt_diff
par.long: difference between allometric DBH bleaf and DBH crown area exponents

par.name: fates_allom_cmode
par.long: coarse root biomass allometry function index.

par.name: fates_allom_d2bl1
par.long: Parameter 1 for d2bl allometry

par.name: fates_allom_d2bl2
par.long: Parameter 2 for d2bl allometry

par.name: fates_allom_d2bl3
par.long: Parameter 3 for d2bl allometry

par.name: fates_allom_d2ca_coefficient_max
par.long: max (savanna) dbh to area multiplier factor where area n*d2ca_coeff*dbh^beta

par.name: fates_allom_d2ca_coefficient_min
par.long: min (forest) dbh to area multiplier factor where area n*d2ca_coeff*dbh^beta

par.name: fates_allom_d2h1
par.long: Parameter 1 for d2h allometry (intercept, or c)

par.name: fates_allom_d2h2
par.long: Parameter 2 for d2h allometry (slope, or m)

par.name: fates_allom_d2h3
par.long: Parameter 3 for d2h allometry (optional)

par.name: fates_allom_dbh_maxheight
par.long: the diameter (if any) corresponding to maximum height, diameters may increase beyond this

par.name: fates_allom_dmode
par.long: crown depth allometry function index

par.name: fates_allom_fmode
par.long: fine root biomass allometry function index.

par.name: fates_allom_fnrt_prof_a
par.long: Fine root profile function, parameter a

par.name: fates_allom_fnrt_prof_b
par.long: Fine root profile function, parameter b

par.name: fates_allom_fnrt_prof_mode
par.long: Index to select fine root profile function 1) Jackson Beta, 2) 1-param exponential 3) 2-param exponential

par.name: fates_allom_frbstor_repro
par.long: fraction of bstore goes to reproduction after plant dies

par.name: fates_allom_h2cd1
par.long: Parameter 1 for h2cd allometry (exp(log-intercept) or scaling). If allom_dmode1 this is the same as former crown_depth_frac parameter

par.name: fates_allom_h2cd2
par.long: Parameter 2 for h2cd allometry (log-slope or exponent). If allom_dmode1 this is not needed (as exponent is assumed 1)

par.name: fates_allom_hmode
par.long: height allometry function index.

par.name: fates_allom_l2fr
par.long: Allocation parameter fine root C per leaf C

par.name: fates_allom_la_per_sa_int
par.long: Leaf area per sapwood area, intercept

par.name: fates_allom_la_per_sa_slp
par.long: Leaf area per sapwood area rate of change with height, slope (optional)

par.name: fates_allom_lmode
par.long: leaf biomass allometry function index.

par.name: fates_allom_sai_scaler
par.long: allometric ratio of SAI per LAI

par.name: fates_allom_smode
par.long: sapwood allometry function index.

par.name: fates_allom_stmode
par.long: storage allometry function index 1) Storage proportional to leaf biomass (with trimming), 2) Storage proportional to maximum leaf biomass (not trimmed)

par.name: fates_allom_zroot_k
par.long: scale coefficient of logistic rooting depth model

par.name: fates_allom_zroot_max_dbh
par.long: dbh at which a plant reaches the maximum value for its maximum rooting depth

par.name: fates_allom_zroot_max_z
par.long: the maximum rooting depth defined at dbh fates_allom_zroot_max_dbh. note max_zmin_zlarge, sets rooting depth to soil depth

par.name: fates_allom_zroot_min_dbh
par.long: dbh at which the maximum rooting depth for a recruit is defined

par.name: fates_allom_zroot_min_z
par.long: the maximum rooting depth defined at dbh fates_allom_zroot_min_dbh. note max_zmin_zlarge, sets rooting depth to soil depth

par.name: fates_c2b
par.long: Carbon to biomass multiplier of bulk structural tissues

par.name: fates_cnp_eca_alpha_ptase
par.long: (INACTIVE, KEEP AT 0) fraction of P from ptase activity sent directly to plant (ECA)

par.name: fates_cnp_eca_decompmicc
par.long: maximum soil microbial decomposer biomass found over depth (will be applied at a reference depth w/ exponential attenuation) (ECA)

par.name: fates_cnp_eca_km_nh4
par.long: half-saturation constant for plant nh4 uptake (ECA)

par.name: fates_cnp_eca_km_no3
par.long: half-saturation constant for plant no3 uptake (ECA)

par.name: fates_cnp_eca_km_p
par.long: half-saturation constant for plant p uptake (ECA)

par.name: fates_cnp_eca_km_ptase
par.long: half-saturation constant for biochemical P (ECA)

par.name: fates_cnp_eca_lambda_ptase
par.long: (INACTIVE, KEEP AT 0) critical value for biochemical production (ECA)

par.name: fates_cnp_eca_vmax_ptase
par.long: maximum production rate for biochemical P (per m2) (ECA)

par.name: fates_cnp_nfix1
par.long: fractional surcharge added to maintenance respiration that drives symbiotic fixation

par.name: fates_cnp_nitr_store_ratio
par.long: storeable (labile) N, as a ratio compared to the N bound in cell structures of other organs (see code)

par.name: fates_cnp_phos_store_ratio
par.long: storeable (labile) P, as a ratio compared to the P bound in cell structures of other organs (see code)

par.name: fates_cnp_pid_kd
par.long: derivative constant of the PID controller on adaptive fine-root biomass

par.name: fates_cnp_pid_ki
par.long: integral constant of the PID controller on adaptive fine-root biomass

par.name: fates_cnp_pid_kp
par.long: proportional constant of the PID controller on adaptive fine-root biomass

par.name: fates_cnp_prescribed_nuptake
par.long: Prescribed N uptake flux. 0fully coupled simulation >0prescribed (experimental)

par.name: fates_cnp_prescribed_puptake
par.long: Prescribed P uptake flux. 0fully coupled simulation, >0prescribed (experimental)

par.name: fates_cnp_store_ovrflw_frac
par.long: size of overflow storage (for excess C,N or P) as a fraction of storage target

par.name: fates_cnp_turnover_nitr_retrans
par.long: retranslocation (reabsorbtion) fraction of nitrogen in turnover of scenescing tissues

par.name: fates_cnp_turnover_phos_retrans
par.long: retranslocation (reabsorbtion) fraction of phosphorus in turnover of scenescing tissues

par.name: fates_cnp_vmax_nh4
par.long: maximum (potential) uptake rate of NH4 per gC of fineroot biomass (see main/EDPftvarcon.F90 vmax_nh4 for usage)

par.name: fates_cnp_vmax_no3
par.long: maximum (potential) uptake rate of NO3 per gC of fineroot biomass (see main/EDPftvarcon.F90 vmax_no3 for usage)

par.name: fates_cnp_vmax_p
par.long: maximum production rate for phosphorus (ECA and RD)

par.name: fates_damage_frac
par.long: fraction of cohort damaged in each damage event (event frequency specified in the is_it_damage_time subroutine)

par.name: fates_damage_mort_p1
par.long: inflection point of damage mortality function, a value of 0.8 means 50% mortality with 80% loss of crown, turn off with a large number

par.name: fates_damage_mort_p2
par.long: rate of mortality increase with damage

par.name: fates_damage_recovery_scalar
par.long: fraction of the cohort that recovers from damage

par.name: fates_dev_arbitrary_pft
par.long: Unassociated pft dimensioned free parameter that developers can use for testing arbitrary new hypotheses
par.data: nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan

par.name: fates_fire_alpha_SH
par.long: spitfire parameter, alpha scorch height, Equation 16 Thonicke et al 2010

par.name: fates_fire_bark_scaler
par.long: the thickness of a cohorts bark as a fraction of its dbh

par.name: fates_fire_crown_kill
par.long: fire parameter, see equation 22 in Thonicke et al 2010

par.name: fates_frag_fnrt_fcel
par.long: Fine root litter cellulose fraction

par.name: fates_frag_fnrt_flab
par.long: Fine root litter labile fraction

par.name: fates_frag_fnrt_flig
par.long: Fine root litter lignin fraction

par.name: fates_frag_leaf_fcel
par.long: Leaf litter cellulose fraction

par.name: fates_frag_leaf_flab
par.long: Leaf litter labile fraction

par.name: fates_frag_leaf_flig
par.long: Leaf litter lignin fraction

par.name: fates_frag_seed_decay_rate
par.long: fraction of seeds that decay per year

par.name: fates_grperc
par.long: Growth respiration factor

par.name: fates_hydro_avuln_gs
par.long: shape parameter for stomatal control of water vapor exiting leaf

par.name: fates_hydro_avuln_node
par.long: xylem vulnerability curve shape parameter

par.name: fates_hydro_epsil_node
par.long: bulk elastic modulus

par.name: fates_hydro_fcap_node
par.long: fraction of non-residual water that is capillary in source

par.name: fates_hydro_k_lwp
par.long: inner leaf humidity scaling coefficient

par.name: fates_hydro_kmax_node
par.long: maximum xylem conductivity per unit conducting xylem area

par.name: fates_hydro_p50_gs
par.long: water potential at 50% loss of stomatal conductance

par.name: fates_hydro_p50_node
par.long: xylem water potential at 50% loss of conductivity

par.name: fates_hydro_p_taper
par.long: xylem taper exponent

par.name: fates_hydro_pinot_node
par.long: osmotic potential at full turgor

par.name: fates_hydro_pitlp_node
par.long: turgor loss point

par.name: fates_hydro_resid_node
par.long: residual water conent

par.name: fates_hydro_rfrac_stem
par.long: fraction of total tree resistance from troot to canopy

par.name: fates_hydro_rs2
par.long: absorbing root radius

par.name: fates_hydro_srl
par.long: specific root length

par.name: fates_hydro_thetas_node
par.long: saturated water content

par.name: fates_hydro_vg_alpha_node
par.long: (used if hydr_htftype_node 2), capillary length parameter in van Genuchten model

par.name: fates_hydro_vg_m_node
par.long: (used if hydr_htftype_node 2),m in van Genuchten 1980 model, 2nd pore size distribution parameter

par.name: fates_hydro_vg_n_node
par.long: (used if hydr_htftype_node 2),n in van Genuchten 1980 model, pore size distribution parameter

par.name: fates_landuse_grazing_palatability
par.long: Relative intensity of leaf grazing/browsing per PFT

par.name: fates_landuse_harvest_pprod10
par.long: fraction of harvest wood product that goes to 10-year product pool (remainder goes to 100-year pool)

par.name: fates_landuse_luc_frac_burned
par.long: fraction of land use change-generated and not-exported material that is burned (the remainder goes to litter)

par.name: fates_landuse_luc_frac_exported
par.long: fraction of land use change-generated wood material that is exported to wood product (the remainder is either burned or goes to litter)

par.name: fates_landuse_luc_pprod10
par.long: fraction of land use change wood product that goes to 10-year product pool (remainder goes to 100-year pool)

par.name: fates_leaf_agross_btran_model
par.long: model switch for how gross assimilation affects conductance. See LeafBiophysicsMod.F90, integer constants btran_on_

par.name: fates_leaf_c3psn
par.long: Photosynthetic pathway (1c3, 0c4)

par.name: fates_leaf_fnps
par.long: fraction of light absorbed by non-photosynthetic pigments

par.name: fates_leaf_jmaxha
par.long: activation energy for jmax. NOTE if fates_leaf_photo_tempsens_model2 then these values are NOT USED

par.name: fates_leaf_jmaxhd
par.long: deactivation energy for jmax. NOTE if fates_leaf_photo_tempsens_model2 then these values are NOT USED

par.name: fates_leaf_jmaxse
par.long: entropy term for jmax. NOTE if fates_leaf_photo_tempsens_model2 then these values are NOT USED

par.name: fates_leaf_slamax
par.long: Maximum Specific Leaf Area (SLA), even if under a dense canopy

par.name: fates_leaf_slatop
par.long: Specific Leaf Area (SLA) at top of canopy, projected area basis

par.name: fates_leaf_stomatal_btran_model
par.long: model switch for how btran affects conductance. See LeafBiophysicsMod.F90, integer constants btran_on_

par.name: fates_leaf_stomatal_intercept
par.long: Minimum unstressed stomatal conductance for Ball-Berry model and Medlyn model

par.name: fates_leaf_stomatal_slope_ballberry
par.long: stomatal slope parameter, as per Ball-Berry

par.name: fates_leaf_stomatal_slope_medlyn
par.long: stomatal slope parameter, as per Medlyn

par.name: fates_leaf_vcmax25top
par.long: maximum carboxylation rate of Rub. at 25C, canopy top

par.name: fates_leaf_vcmaxha
par.long: activation energy for vcmax. NOTE if fates_leaf_photo_tempsens_model2 then these values are NOT USED

par.name: fates_leaf_vcmaxhd
par.long: deactivation energy for vcmax. NOTE if fates_leaf_photo_tempsens_model2 then these values are NOT USED

par.name: fates_leaf_vcmaxse
par.long: entropy term for vcmax. NOTE if fates_leaf_photo_tempsens_model2 then these values are NOT USED

par.name: fates_leafn_vert_scaler_coeff1
par.long: Coefficient one for decrease in leaf nitrogen through the canopy, from Lloyd et al. 2010.

par.name: fates_leafn_vert_scaler_coeff2
par.long: Coefficient two for decrease in leaf nitrogen through the canopy, from Lloyd et al. 2010.

par.name: fates_maintresp_leaf_atkin2017_baserate
par.long: Leaf maintenance respiration base rate parameter (r0) per Atkin et al 2017

par.name: fates_maintresp_leaf_ryan1991_baserate
par.long: Leaf maintenance respiration base rate per Ryan et al 1991

par.name: fates_maintresp_leaf_vert_scaler_coeff1
par.long: Leaf maintenance respiration decrease through the canopy. Only applies to Atkin et al. 2017. For proportionality between photosynthesis and respiration through the canopy, match with fates_leafn_vert_scaler_coeff1.

par.name: fates_maintresp_leaf_vert_scaler_coeff2
par.long: Leaf maintenance respiration decrease through the canopy. Only applies to Atkin et al. 2017. For proportionality between photosynthesis and respiration through the canopy, match with fates_leafn_vert_scaler_coeff2.

par.name: fates_maintresp_reduction_curvature
par.long: curvature of MR reduction as f(carbon storage), 1linear, 0very curved

par.name: fates_maintresp_reduction_intercept
par.long: intercept of MR reduction as f(carbon storage), 0no throttling, 1max throttling

par.name: fates_maintresp_reduction_upthresh
par.long: upper threshold for storage biomass (relative to leaf biomass) above which MR is not reduced

par.name: fates_mort_bmort
par.long: background mortality rate

par.name: fates_mort_freezetol
par.long: minimum temperature tolerance

par.name: fates_mort_hf_flc_threshold
par.long: plant fractional loss of conductivity at which drought mortality begins for hydraulic model

par.name: fates_mort_hf_sm_threshold
par.long: soil moisture (btran units) at which drought mortality begins for non-hydraulic model

par.name: fates_mort_ip_age_senescence
par.long: Mortality cohort age senescence inflection point. If _ this mortality term is off. Setting this value turns on age dependent mortality.
par.data: nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan

par.name: fates_mort_ip_size_senescence
par.long: Mortality dbh senescence inflection point. If _ this mortality term is off. Setting this value turns on size dependent mortality
par.data: nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan

par.name: fates_mort_prescribed_canopy
par.long: mortality rate of canopy trees for prescribed physiology mode

par.name: fates_mort_prescribed_understory
par.long: mortality rate of understory trees for prescribed physiology mode

par.name: fates_mort_r_age_senescence
par.long: Mortality age senescence rate of change. Sensible range is around 0.03-0.06. Larger values givesteeper mortality curves.
par.data: nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan

par.name: fates_mort_r_size_senescence
par.long: Mortality dbh senescence rate of change. Sensible range is around 0.03-0.06. Larger values give steeper mortality curves.
par.data: nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan

par.name: fates_mort_scalar_coldstress
par.long: maximum mortality rate from cold stress

par.name: fates_mort_scalar_cstarvation
par.long: maximum mortality rate from carbon starvation

par.name: fates_mort_scalar_hydrfailure
par.long: maximum mortality rate from hydraulic failure

par.name: fates_mort_upthresh_cstarvation
par.long: threshold for storage biomass (relative to target leaf biomass) above which carbon starvation is zero

par.name: fates_nonhydro_smpsc
par.long: Soil water potential at full stomatal closure

par.name: fates_nonhydro_smpso
par.long: Soil water potential at full stomatal opening

par.name: fates_phen_cold_size_threshold
par.long: the dbh size above which will lead to phenology-related stem and leaf drop

par.name: fates_phen_drought_threshold
par.long: threshold for drought phenology (or lower threshold for semi-deciduous PFTs) the quantity depends on the sign if positive, the threshold is volumetric soil moisture (m3/m3). If negative, the threshold is soil matric potentical (mm)

par.name: fates_phen_flush_fraction
par.long: Upon bud-burst, the maximum fraction of storage carbon used for flushing leaves

par.name: fates_phen_fnrt_drop_fraction
par.long: fraction of fine roots to drop during drought/cold

par.name: fates_phen_leaf_habit
par.long: Flag for leaf phenology habit. 1 - evergreen 2 - season (cold) deciduous 3 - stress (hydro) deciduous 4 - stress (hydro) semi-deciduous

par.name: fates_phen_mindaysoff
par.long: day threshold compared against days since leaves abscised (shed)

par.name: fates_phen_moist_threshold
par.long: upper threshold for drought phenology (only for drought semi-deciduous PFTs) the quantity depends on the sign if positive, the threshold is volumetric soil moisture (m3/m3). If negative, the threshold is soil matric potentical (mm)

par.name: fates_phen_stem_drop_fraction
par.long: fraction of stems to drop for non-woody species during drought/cold

par.name: fates_prescribed_npp_canopy
par.long: NPP per unit crown area of canopy trees for prescribed physiology mode

par.name: fates_prescribed_npp_understory
par.long: NPP per unit crown area of understory trees for prescribed physiology mode

par.name: fates_rad_leaf_clumping_index
par.long: factor describing how much self-occlusion of leaf scattering elements decreases light interception

par.name: fates_rad_leaf_rhonir
par.long: Leaf reflectance near-IR

par.name: fates_rad_leaf_rhovis
par.long: Leaf reflectance visible

par.name: fates_rad_leaf_taunir
par.long: Leaf transmittance near-IR

par.name: fates_rad_leaf_tauvis
par.long: Leaf transmittance visible

par.name: fates_rad_leaf_xl
par.long: Leaf/stem orientation index

par.name: fates_rad_stem_rhonir
par.long: Stem reflectance near-IR

par.name: fates_rad_stem_rhovis
par.long: Stem reflectance visible

par.name: fates_rad_stem_taunir
par.long: Stem transmittance near-IR

par.name: fates_rad_stem_tauvis
par.long: Stem transmittance visible

par.name: fates_recruit_height_min
par.long: the minimum height (ie starting height) of a newly recruited plant

par.name: fates_recruit_init_density
par.long: initial seedling density for a cold-start near-bare-ground simulation. If negative sets initial tree dbh - only to be used in nocomp mode

par.name: fates_recruit_prescribed_rate
par.long: recruitment rate for prescribed physiology mode

par.name: fates_recruit_seed_alloc
par.long: fraction of available carbon balance allocated to seeds

par.name: fates_recruit_seed_alloc_mature
par.long: fraction of available carbon balance allocated to seeds in mature plants (adds to fates_seed_alloc)

par.name: fates_recruit_seed_dbh_repro_threshold
par.long: the diameter where the plant will increase allocation to the seed pool by fraction fates_recruit_seed_alloc_mature

par.name: fates_recruit_seed_germination_rate
par.long: fraction of seeds that germinate per year

par.name: fates_recruit_seed_supplement
par.long: Supplemental external seed rain source term (non-mass conserving)

par.name: fates_seed_dispersal_fraction
par.long: fraction of seed rain to be dispersed to other grid cells
par.data: nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan

par.name: fates_seed_dispersal_max_dist
par.long: maximum seed dispersal distance for a given pft
par.data: nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan

par.name: fates_seed_dispersal_pdf_scale
par.long: seed dispersal probability density function scale parameter, A, Table 1 Bullock et al 2016
par.data: nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan

par.name: fates_seed_dispersal_pdf_shape
par.long: seed dispersal probability density function shape parameter, B, Table 1 Bullock et al 2016
par.data: nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan, nan

par.name: fates_stoich_nitr
par.long: target nitrogen concentration (ratio with carbon) of organs

par.name: fates_stoich_phos
par.long: target phosphorus concentration (ratio with carbon) of organs

par.name: fates_trim_inc
par.long: Arbitrary incremental change in trimming function.

par.name: fates_trim_limit
par.long: Arbitrary limit to reductions in leaf area with stress

par.name: fates_trs_repro_alloc_a
par.long: shape parameter for sigmoidal function relating dbh to reproductive allocation

par.name: fates_trs_repro_alloc_b
par.long: intercept parameter for sigmoidal function relating dbh to reproductive allocation

par.name: fates_trs_repro_frac_seed
par.long: fraction of reproductive mass that is seed

par.name: fates_trs_seedling_a_emerg
par.long: mean fraction of seed bank emerging

par.name: fates_trs_seedling_b_emerg
par.long: seedling emergence sensitivity to soil moisture

par.name: fates_trs_seedling_background_mort
par.long: background seedling mortality rate

par.name: fates_trs_seedling_h2o_mort_a
par.long: coefficient in moisture-based seedling mortality

par.name: fates_trs_seedling_h2o_mort_b
par.long: coefficient in moisture-based seedling mortality

par.name: fates_trs_seedling_h2o_mort_c
par.long: coefficient in moisture-based seedling mortality

par.name: fates_trs_seedling_light_mort_a
par.long: light-based seedling mortality coefficient

par.name: fates_trs_seedling_light_mort_b
par.long: light-based seedling mortality coefficient

par.name: fates_trs_seedling_light_rec_a
par.long: coefficient in light-based seedling to sapling transition

par.name: fates_trs_seedling_light_rec_b
par.long: coefficient in light-based seedling to sapling transition

par.name: fates_trs_seedling_mdd_crit
par.long: critical moisture deficit (suction) day accumulation for seedling moisture-based seedling mortality to begin

par.name: fates_trs_seedling_par_crit_germ
par.long: critical light level for germination

par.name: fates_trs_seedling_psi_crit
par.long: critical soil moisture (suction) for seedling stress

par.name: fates_trs_seedling_psi_emerg
par.long: critical soil moisture for seedling emergence

par.name: fates_trs_seedling_root_depth
par.long: rooting depth of seedlings

par.name: fates_turb_displar
par.long: Ratio of displacement height to canopy top height

par.name: fates_turb_leaf_diameter
par.long: Characteristic leaf dimension

par.name: fates_turb_z0mr
par.long: Ratio of momentum roughness length to canopy top height

par.name: fates_turnover_branch
par.long: turnover time of branches

par.name: fates_turnover_fnrt
par.long: root longevity (alternatively, turnover time)

par.name: fates_turnover_leaf_canopy
par.long: Leaf longevity (ie turnover timescale) of canopy plants. For drought-deciduous PFTs, this also indicates the maximum length of the growing (i.e., leaves on) season.

par.name: fates_turnover_leaf_ustory
par.long: Leaf longevity (ie turnover timescale) of understory plants.

par.name: fates_turnover_senleaf_fdrought
par.long: multiplication factor for leaf longevity of senescent leaves during drought

par.name: fates_wood_density
par.long: mean density of woody tissue in plant

par.name: fates_woody
par.long: Binary woody lifeform flag

par.name: fates_hlm_pft_map
par.long: In fixed biogeog mode, fraction of HLM area associated with each FATES PFT

par.name: fates_fire_FBD
par.long: fuel bulk density

par.name: fates_fire_low_moisture_Coeff
par.long: spitfire parameter, equation B1 Thonicke et al 2010

par.name: fates_fire_low_moisture_Slope
par.long: spitfire parameter, equation B1 Thonicke et al 2010

par.name: fates_fire_mid_moisture
par.long: spitfire litter moisture threshold to be considered medium dry

par.name: fates_fire_mid_moisture_Coeff
par.long: spitfire parameter, equation B1 Thonicke et al 2010

par.name: fates_fire_mid_moisture_Slope
par.long: spitfire parameter, equation B1 Thonicke et al 2010

par.name: fates_fire_min_moisture
par.long: spitfire litter moisture threshold to be considered very dry

par.name: fates_fire_SAV
par.long: fuel surface area to volume ratio

par.name: fates_frag_maxdecomp
par.long: maximum rate of litter and CWD transfer from non-decomposing class into decomposing class

par.name: fates_frag_cwd_frac
par.long: fraction of woody (bdead+bsw) biomass destined for CWD pool

par.name: fates_landuse_crop_lu_pft_vector
par.long: the FATES PFT index to use on a given crop land-use type (dummy value of -999 for non-crop types)

par.name: fates_landuse_grazing_rate
par.long: fraction of leaf biomass consumed by grazers per day

par.name: fates_max_nocomp_pfts_by_landuse
par.long: maximum number of nocomp PFTs on each land use type (only used in nocomp mode)

par.name: fates_maxpatches_by_landuse
par.long: maximum number of patches per site on each land use type

par.name: fates_canopy_closure_thresh
par.long: tree canopy coverage at which crown area allometry changes from savanna to forest value

par.name: fates_cnp_eca_plant_escalar
par.long: scaling factor for plant fine root biomass to calculate nutrient carrier enzyme abundance (ECA)

par.name: fates_cohort_age_fusion_tol
par.long: minimum fraction in differece in cohort age between cohorts.

par.name: fates_cohort_size_fusion_tol
par.long: minimum fraction in difference in dbh between cohorts

par.name: fates_comp_excln
par.long: IF POSITIVE weighting factor (exponent on dbh) for canopy layer exclusion and promotion, IF NEGATIVE switch to use deterministic height sorting

par.name: fates_damage_canopy_layer_code
par.long: Integer code that decides whether damage affects canopy trees (1), understory trees (2)

par.name: fates_damage_event_code
par.long: Integer code that options how damage events are structured

par.name: fates_dev_arbitrary
par.long: Unassociated free parameter that developers can use for testing arbitrary new hypotheses

par.name: fates_fire_active_crown_fire
par.long: flag, 1active crown fire 0no active crown fire

par.name: fates_fire_cg_strikes
par.long: fraction of cloud to ground lightning strikes

par.name: fates_fire_drying_ratio
par.long: spitfire parameter, fire drying ratio for fuel moisture, alpha_FMC EQ 6 Thonicke et al 2010

par.name: fates_fire_durat_slope
par.long: spitfire parameter, fire max duration slope, Equation 14 Thonicke et al 2010

par.name: fates_fire_fdi_alpha
par.long: spitfire parameter, EQ 7 Venevsky et al. GCB 2002,(modified EQ 8 Thonicke et al. 2010)

par.name: fates_fire_fuel_energy
par.long: spitfire parameter, heat content of fuel

par.name: fates_fire_max_durat
par.long: spitfire parameter, fire maximum duration, Equation 14 Thonicke et al 2010

par.name: fates_fire_miner_damp
par.long: spitfire parameter, mineral-dampening coefficient EQ A1 Thonicke et al 2010

par.name: fates_fire_miner_total
par.long: spitfire parameter, total mineral content, Table A1 Thonicke et al 2010

par.name: fates_fire_nignitions
par.long: number of annual ignitions per square km

par.name: fates_fire_part_dens
par.long: spitfire parameter, oven dry particle density, Table A1 Thonicke et al 2010

par.name: fates_fire_threshold
par.long: spitfire parameter, fire intensity threshold for tracking fires that spread

par.name: fates_frag_cwd_fcel
par.long: Cellulose fraction for CWD

par.name: fates_frag_cwd_flig
par.long: Lignin fraction of coarse woody debris

par.name: fates_hydro_kmax_rsurf1
par.long: maximum conducitivity for unit root surface (into root)

par.name: fates_hydro_kmax_rsurf2
par.long: maximum conducitivity for unit root surface (out of root)

par.name: fates_hydro_psi0
par.long: sapwood water potential at saturation

par.name: fates_hydro_psicap
par.long: sapwood water potential at which capillary reserves exhausted

par.name: fates_landuse_grazing_carbon_use_eff
par.long: carbon use efficiency of material eaten by grazers/browsers (i.e. amount in manure / amount consumed)

par.name: fates_landuse_grazing_maxheight
par.long: maximum height that grazers (browsers, actually) can reach

par.name: fates_landuse_grazing_nitrogen_use_eff
par.long: nitrogen use efficiency of material eaten by grazers/browsers (i.e. amount in manure / amount consumed)

par.name: fates_landuse_grazing_phosphorus_use_eff
par.long: phosphorus use efficiency of material eaten by grazers/browsers (i.e. amount in manure / amount consumed)

par.name: fates_landuse_logging_coll_under_frac
par.long: Fraction of stems killed in the understory when logging generates disturbance

par.name: fates_landuse_logging_collateral_frac
par.long: Fraction of large stems in upperstory that die from logging collateral damage

par.name: fates_landuse_logging_dbhmax
par.long: Maximum dbh below which logging is applied (unset values flag this to be unused)

par.name: fates_landuse_logging_dbhmax_infra
par.long: Tree diameter, above which infrastructure from logging does not impact damage or mortality.

par.name: fates_landuse_logging_dbhmin
par.long: Minimum dbh at which logging is applied

par.name: fates_landuse_logging_direct_frac
par.long: Fraction of stems logged directly per event

par.name: fates_landuse_logging_event_code
par.long: Integer code that options how logging events are structured

par.name: fates_landuse_logging_export_frac
par.long: fraction of trunk product being shipped offsite, the leftovers will be left onsite as large CWD

par.name: fates_landuse_logging_mechanical_frac
par.long: Fraction of stems killed due infrastructure an other mechanical means

par.name: fates_leaf_photo_temp_acclim_thome_time
par.long: Length of the window for the long-term (i.e. T_home in Kumarathunge et al 2019) exponential moving average (ema) of vegetation temperature used in photosynthesis temperature acclimation (used if fates_leaf_photo_tempsens_model 2)

par.name: fates_leaf_photo_temp_acclim_timescale
par.long: Length of the window for the exponential moving average (ema) of vegetation temperature used in photosynthesis temperature acclimation (used if fates_maintresp_leaf_model2 or fates_leaf_photo_tempsens_model 2)

par.name: fates_maintresp_nonleaf_baserate
par.long: Base maintenance respiration rate for plant tissues, using Ryan 1991

par.name: fates_maxcohort
par.long: maximum number of cohorts per patch. Actual number of cohorts also depend on cohort fusion tolerances

par.name: fates_mort_disturb_frac
par.long: fraction of canopy mortality that results in disturbance (i.e. transfer of area from old to new patch)

par.name: fates_mort_understorey_death
par.long: fraction of plants in understorey cohort impacted by overstorey tree-fall

par.name: fates_patch_fusion_tol
par.long: minimum fraction in difference in profiles between patches

par.name: fates_phen_chilltemp
par.long: chilling day counting threshold for vegetation

par.name: fates_phen_coldtemp
par.long: vegetation temperature exceedance that flags a cold-day for leaf-drop

par.name: fates_phen_gddthresh_a
par.long: GDD accumulation function, intercept parameter gdd_thesh a + b exp(c*ncd)

par.name: fates_phen_gddthresh_b
par.long: GDD accumulation function, multiplier parameter gdd_thesh a + b exp(c*ncd)

par.name: fates_phen_gddthresh_c
par.long: GDD accumulation function, exponent parameter gdd_thesh a + b exp(c*ncd)

par.name: fates_phen_mindayson
par.long: day threshold compared against days since leaves became on-allometry

par.name: fates_phen_ncolddayslim
par.long: day threshold exceedance for temperature leaf-drop

par.name: fates_q10_froz
par.long: Q10 for frozen-soil respiration rates

par.name: fates_q10_mr
par.long: Q10 for maintenance respiration

par.name: fates_rxfire_AB
par.long: daily burn capacity of prescribed fire

par.name: fates_rxfire_fuel_max
par.long: maximum fuel load at or above which prescribed fire is disallowed

par.name: fates_rxfire_fuel_min
par.long: minimum fuel load at or below which prescribed fire is disallowed

par.name: fates_rxfire_max_threshold
par.long: maximum energy threshold at or above which prescribed fire is disallowed

par.name: fates_rxfire_min_frac
par.long: minimum fraction of land needs to be burnable to allow rx fire

par.name: fates_rxfire_min_threshold
par.long: minimum energy threshold at or above which prescribed fire is disallowed

par.name: fates_rxfire_rh_lwthreshold
par.long: minimum relative humidity threshold below which prescribed fire is disallowed

par.name: fates_rxfire_rh_upthreshold
par.long: maximum relative humidity threshold above which prescribed fire is disallowed

par.name: fates_rxfire_temp_lwthreshold
par.long: minimum temprature threshold below which prescribed fire is disallowed

par.name: fates_rxfire_temp_upthreshold
par.long: maximum temprature threshold above which prescribed fire is disallowed

par.name: fates_rxfire_wind_lwthreshold
par.long: minimum wind speed threshold below which prescribed fire is disallowed

par.name: fates_rxfire_wind_upthreshold
par.long: maximum wind speed threshold above which prescribed fire is disallowed

par.name: fates_soil_salinity
par.long: soil salinity used for model when not coupled to dynamic soil salinity

par.name: fates_trs_seedling2sap_par_timescale
par.long: Length of the window for the exponential moving average of par at the seedling layer used to calculate seedling to sapling transition rates

par.name: fates_trs_seedling_emerg_h2o_timescale
par.long: Length of the window for the exponential moving average of smp used to calculate seedling emergence

par.name: fates_trs_seedling_mdd_timescale
par.long: Length of the window for the exponential moving average of moisture deficit days used to calculate seedling mortality

par.name: fates_trs_seedling_mort_par_timescale
par.long: Length of the window for the exponential moving average of par at the seedling layer used to calculate seedling mortality

par.name: fates_vai_top_bin_width
par.long: width in VAI units of uppermost leaf+stem layer scattering element in each canopy layer

par.name: fates_vai_width_increase_factor
par.long: factor by which each leaf+stem scattering element increases in VAI width (1 uniform spacing)
